SETTINGS_APPEARANCE.heading: Appearance Console
SETTINGS_APPEARANCE.tagline: Personalize the Colony interface to match your mission tempo.
paragraphs: Dial in color harmonies tuned for dim command decks or bright observation bays.
Switch schemes instantly to align with the crew mood or operations cycle.
heroHighlights: Unified palette preview across navigation, library, and hero panels
Instant theme application without restarting the console
Catppuccin, Gruvbox, Solarized, Everblush, Cyberdream, and One Dark presets
SETTINGS_APPEARANCE.statusMessage: Select a palette to update the interface chroma.

SETTINGS_LANGUAGE.heading: Language Console
SETTINGS_LANGUAGE.tagline: Switch Colony to your preferred language with native typography.
paragraphs: Preview localized copy before committing to a new primary language.
Assign authentic scripts so each crew member sees familiar lettering.
heroHighlights: Localized navigation, hero, and status copy
Automatic font selection for supported languages
SETTINGS_LANGUAGE.statusMessage: Choose a language to localize the interface.

SETTINGS_GENERAL.heading: Comfort Console
SETTINGS_GENERAL.tagline: Fine-tune everyday Colony behaviors and notifications.
paragraphs: Toggle auditory cues, update cadence, and motion sensitivity to support each operator.
Preferences persist across missions so the console always boots in a familiar state.
heroHighlights: Notification, sound, and update cadence toggles
Reduced motion option for sensitive operators
